FlexiPage.description: Lightning Page Layout for a Lender Account Record Type

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
ACCOUNT IN LITIGATION

This account has been identified in association to an investigation.  It requires that we preserve all relevant information in connection with the Account, Contact, and/or Deal information.  Please do not delete or modify information related to this Account, Contact(s), and/or Deal(s)
 
In addition, please do not discuss the investigation with contacts from this Account should he/she contacts you in connection to details associated to this account.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Do Not Lend

This Account has been tagged as "Do Not Lend". Please refer to the "Reason for Not Lending" field for further details.
